headline: How PepsiCo’s Deeper Boardroom Role Will Impact Celsius Holdings (CELH) Investors
summary: Celsius Holdings recently saw two PepsiCo-designated directors resign and be replaced by senior PepsiCo executives Christy Jacoby and John Short, while Tony Guilfoyle shifted from Chief Commercial Officer to Chief Customer Officer, all ahead of the company’s February 19, 2026 presentation at the Consumer Analyst Group of New York conference in Orlando. These Board and leadership changes deepen PepsiCo’s influence over Celsius’s governance and commercial direction, sharpening investor focus...

These Board and leadership changes deepen PepsiCo’s influence over Celsius’s governance and commercial direction, sharpening investor focus...
